title: Inflation rate forecast ( CPI ) in the United Kingdom ( UK ) Q3 2019 to Q1 2024
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Inflation rate forecast for 19 number of Quarters.
The Inflation rate forecast is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q3 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q2 2020.
The difference of Inflation rate forecast between the highest and lowest Quarter is 0.28.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Inflation rate forecast in the y axis.
Quarter Q3 2019 has the highest Inflation rate forecast and Q2 2020 has the lowest Inflation rate forecast.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Inflation rate forecast for 19 number of Quarters.
The Inflation rate forecast is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q3 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q2 2020.
The difference of Inflation rate forecast between the highest and lowest Quarter is 0.28.
max_summary: This bar chart has 19 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Inflation rate forecast in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Inflation rate forecast is highest at Quarter Q3 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q2 2020.
The minimum Quarter Q2 2020 has got 1.15 times less Inflation rate forecast than the maximum Quarter Q3 2019.
Inflation rate forecast at Quarter Q3 2019 is 2.1 , second place is Q4 2019 at 2.01, and thirdly is Q2 2022 at 2.0.
Overall Inflation rate forecast has increased over the Quarters.
Quarter Q1 2024, Q4 2023, Q3 2023, Q2 2023, Q1 2023, Q4 2022, Q3 2022, and Q2 2022 share the same value 2.0.
The highest value 2.1 at Q3 2019 is almost 1.07 times larger than the average value 1.97.
Summing up the values of all Quarters, we get total 37.44.
